Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment regimen . - Regimen A : Patients receive cisplatin IV day 2 gemcitabine IV day 1 , 8 , 15 . - Regimen B : Patients receive cisplatin IV day 15 gemcitabine regimen A .
